Product Name: Salomon Men's X Ultra Pioneer MID CLIMASALOMON™ Waterproof Hiking Boots for Men, Black/Magnet/Monument, 11
Product Description: Inspired by the best-selling X Ultra Family, this mid-cut hiking shoe is the go-to option for outdoor enthusiasts. The X ULTRA PIONEER MID CLIMASALOMON WATERPROOF is packed with all the technology you need including waterproof protection. Yet versatile enough to adapt your daily life.
About Product: ClimaSalomon Waterproof: A flexible, lightweight, full waterproof bootie to ensure complete weather protection.
Advanced Chassis: Placed between the outsole and midsole, this lightweight chassis helps optimize motion control, energy management and protection for an efficient, stable yet responsive ride.
Regular laces: Traditional lacing system with eyelets.

TOMORROW IS YOURS: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes and gear for kids, men and women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event
SINCE 1947 Salomon has created innovative outdoor sports gear. From running and hiking to backpacking, skiing and more, our shoes, boots, bags, apparel and accessories help make any path your own

Reviews.Review Body: My husband bought these as a replacement for his old Nike shocks. They offer great support and comfort. Waterproof was his main concern. The stores didn't have his size so for 2 dollars more we got these delivered to our door.
These were delivered May 20, 2024. It's been just barely 3 months & the soles have already started to split. They were supposed to be quality but even a $20 pair of shoes from Walmart lasts longer.
Had to return as the width is too small - literally cutting off circulation....
